alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 9:20PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CITRUS...NORTHWESTERN SUMTER AND NORTHWESTERN HERNANDO COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 920 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Crystal River Airport to near Homosassa Springs to 8 miles northeast of North Weeki Wachee. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Inverness, Bushnell, Homosassa Springs, Beverly Hills, Inverness Airport, Crystal River Airport, Black Diamond, Homosassa, Inverness Highlands South, Inverness Highlands North, Hernando, Sugarmill Woods, Lake Panasoffkee, Arbor Lakes, Royal Highlands, Lecanto, Lake Lindsey, Leisure Acres, Inverness Highlands, and Pine Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
